Terrain::CommonTerrainBlock2

Terrain::CommonTerrainBlock2 Class Reference

This class implements the BaseTerrainBlock interface for the second generation of terrain. More...

Detailed Description

This class implements the BaseTerrainBlock interface for the second generation of terrain.

) const [virtual]

Parameters:

Returns:

bool CommonTerrainBlock2::internalLoad ( std::string const &  filename,
DataSectionPtr  terrainDS,
Matrix const &  worldTransform,
Vector3 const &  cameraPosition,
uint32  heightMapLod,
std::string *  error = NULL 
) [protected]

This function does the actual loading of the block.

Parameters:
filename A file to load the terrain block from.
terrainDS DataSection corresponding to the file 'filename'.
worldPosition The position that the terrain will placed.
cameraPosition The position of the camera (to work out LoD level).
heightMapLod Index of the height map LoD to load.
error If not null and there was an error loading the terrain then this will be set to a description of the problem.
Returns:
True if the load was completely successful, false if a problem occurred.

bool CommonTerrainBlock2::load ( std::string const &  filename,
Matrix const &  worldTransform,
Vector3 const &  cameraPosition,
std::string *  error = NULL 
) [virtual]

This function loads an BaseTerrainBlock from a DataSection.

Parameters:
filename A file to load the terrain block from.
worldPosition The position that the terrain will placed.
cameraPosition The position of the camera (to work out LoD level).
error If not null and there was an error loading the terrain then this will be set to a description of the problem.
Returns:
True if the load was completely successful, false if a problem occured.
